amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Community Development Financial Institutions Fund program by $75 million, from $125 million to $50 million.

action.text: Ms. Waters raised a point of order against the Foley amendment (A012). Ms. Waters stated that the provisions contained in the amendment made changes to a portion of the bill previously considered. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
By unanimous consent, the Foley amendment was withdrawn.
